tutorial.speak:
Your live stream can have hosts to moderate the chat and respond to prayer requests. To add a host, click the "Edit Users" link under "External Resources".
This will take you to the Chums application where users and groups are managed. For a full tutorial on this, see the Chums help section. You will need to create a group called "Streaming Hosts", assign the "Host Chat" permission and add your hosts to this group.
When the host is logged into the live stream, they have additional features, such as the ability to delete chat messages and respond to prayer requests.
